title: Helen Grapow
text:
Welcome!
I am a PhD Candidate in Economics at the Department of Economics, Ghent University, Belgium.
My research focuses on methodologies to elicit beliefs (expectations) under uncertainty.
I use experimental and survey methods, together with econometric techniques, to study how beliefs shape economic behavior across different domains.
I am interested in applying these methods to Environmental Economics, Labor Economics, and inflation expectations.
